Diary Milk Factory Mangement System

Is a application which manage a Milk factory in Lebanon , C# web api And Angular Framework

Admin should create brands , unit , Vat and Product categories first then he could add his products by writting the name and chosing the brands and entering the purchase price because this application can calculate the purchase price of all the tranfered products to the main factory to see his win and loss

After finishing the creation of product admin will be redirected to the list of all products which is an http get method to get products , admin can search for his products by the search bar above , choose categories unit or order by name also he can edit or delete the product

Admin can transfer Products to the warehouses and warehouses transfer to trucks , the steps of tranfer , admin chooses warhouse , transfer number will be generated by itself with a get method from c# web api and he should type the quantity and transfer

Admin Can Manage and see his inventory in the main factory and by expanding the arrow he can see more information about the transfer at which time , its number and details

Admin can manage the salesOrder which have been done by the sales men and see every detail he wants about sales order
